thread.title: Taxi passenger shot in the head in Miami Beach
thread.title_full: Taxi passenger shot in the head in Miami Beach

title: Taxi passenger shot in the head in Miami Beach
text:
Taxi passenger wounded in Miami Beach shooting 
Someone shot into a taxicab in Miami Beach Miami 
A taxi cab passenger was shot and wounded early Monday in Miami Beach. 
The shooting happened near 41st Street and Pine Tree Drive, where police are investigating. 
According to early reports, someone shot into the cab. The wounded passenger was taken to Jackson Memorial Hospital. 
Four men in a burgundy BMW opened fire on the cab, hitting one of two passengers in the head, Miami Herald news partner CBS4 reported. The shooters are at large. 
Southbound Pine Tree Drive is shut down between 37th and 40th streets, according to Miami Beach police. 
This bulletin will be updated as more information becomes available. Related content
